mapper.insert: insert into reporter (id, writer_name, intro, category) values (#{id}, #{writer_name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{intro, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{category, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select id, profile_img, category, intro from reporter where id = #{id}
select r.*,u.name,u.email from reporter r join users u on r.id = u.id where r.id=#{id}
select r.id, u.email, r.category, (select count(*) from report_board where assigned = r.id) as assignedCount from reporter r join users u on r.id = u.id where u.role='reporter'
mapper.update: update users set name = #{name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nick = #{nick, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email, jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id} and role = 'reporter'
